name: AstronautFlightReadinessQuestionnaire
title: Astronaut and Space Tourist Medical Screening Questionnaire
description: A medical screening form for astronaut or space tourism flight readiness, based on FAA Form 8500-8, NASA/ESA standards, and commercial vendor practices.

item.text: Are you a United States citizen?
Are you currently between the ages of 28 and 55?
History of cardiac disease (e.g. heart attack, arrhythmia)?
History of neurological issues (e.g. stroke, seizures)?
History of respiratory disorders (e.g. asthma, COPD)?
History of kidney stones or renal disease?
History of motion sickness requiring medication?
List all current medications and supplements
Able to climb 7 flights of stairs in under 90 seconds?
Able to exit seat unassisted in emergency simulation?
